item.title: ERIC
item.description: score:128 Chances: Ericsson’s 5G infrastructure and technology offerings are being utilized by major telecom operators, indicating potential growth in the 5G market. The company’s partnerships and awards reflect its strong position in the cloud communications and digital transformation space, showcasing a positive outlook for future expansion.

item.title: VFC
item.description: score:351 Chances: VF Corp. (VFC) shares fell over 7% Monday after the owner of the Vans and North Face shoe and apparel brands warned that the companyâ€™s business operations were disrupted by a cyberattack. VF said in a regulatory filing Monday that the hacker encrypted some IT systems and stole data, including personal information.
